STP.TXT: Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?
This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.
This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.
This transaction is being approved. Cannot edit this transaction.

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction is already approved. Cannot edit this transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot cancel this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document in this period')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document within approval process')
MlsTrans('Cannot cancel document within approval process')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(DocEntry),SUM(DocTotal) from oabb WITH (NOLOCK) where (CardCode = ':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' = '') and (DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (DocDate between ':4' and ':5') and CONVERT(Nvarchar(15), DocNum) like '%'+ISNULL(':1','')+'%' and (canceled = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') :9 :7 :8

select DocEntry, ObjType,docStatus,canceled,FinncPriod from oabb WITH (NOLOCK) where (CardCode = ':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' = '') and (DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (DocDate between ':4' and ':5') and CONVERT(Nvarchar(15), DocNum) like '%'+ISNULL(':1','')+'%' and (canceled = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') :9 :7 :8 order by DocEntry Desc

select T0.DocDate as 'Posting Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Project Name', TRIM(REPLACE(T0.numatcard,char(59),' ')) as 'Reference No', T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', T1.Dscription as 'Activity', T1.LineTotal as 'Total', Trim(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(T0.comments,char(13),' '),char(10),' '),Char(59),' ')) as 'Remarks', T0.DocStatus as 'Status', T0.ObjType as 'Object Type' from OABB T0 join ABB1 T1 on T0.DocEntry=T1.DocEntry where (T0.CardCode = ':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' = '') and (T0.DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (T0.DocDate between ':4' and ':5') and T0.datasource = 'S' and T0.DocNum like '%'+ISNULL(':1','')+'%' and (T0.canceled = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') and (T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':7' or ':7' is null or ':7' = '') :8 order by T0.DocEntry Desc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'Posting Date,Document Number,Customer Name,Customer Reference,Item Name,Total,Remarks,Status'&IF({32768,111},',Consignee',''),'Posting Date,Document Number,Project Name,Reference No,Activity,Total,Remarks,Status'&IF({32768,111},','&{32768,112},''),{32768,84},';','',0)
